mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HANJU_PRODUCT VALUES ( test_seq.nextVal, #{type}, #{productName}, #{price}, #{userId}, #{madeBy}, #{alcohol}, #{sparkling}, #{sweet}, #{sour}, #{bitter}, #{body}, #{stock}, #{capacity}, #{material}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM HANJU_PRODUCT P INNER JOIN HANJU_CODE C ON C.KIND = 'PRODUCT_CODE' AND P.TYPE = C.CODE LEFT JOIN HANJU_IMAGE I ON P.PRODUCT_ID = I.FK_ID AND I.FILE_STATUS = 'T' WHERE SELLER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY P.CDATETIME DESC OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT * FROM HANJU_IMAGE I INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT P ON I.FK_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID WHERE I.FK_ID = #{productId} AND (I.FILE_STATUS = 'T' OR I.FILE_STATUS = 'P')
mapper.update: UPDATE HANJU_PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}, TYPE = #{type}, PRICE = #{price}, MADE_BY = #{madeBy}, ALCOHOL = #{alcohol}, SPARKLING = #{sparkling}, SWEET = #{sweet}, SOUR = #{sour}, BITTER = #{bitter}, BODY = #{body}, STOCK = #{stock}, CAPACITY = #{capacity}, MATERIAL = #{material} WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HANJU_NORMAL_SELL VALUES (main_seq.nextVal, #{productId}, #{discount}, SYSDATE, null, #{description})
mapper.select: SELECT NS.SELL_ID, P.PRODUCT_ID, P.PRODUCT_NAME, NS.DISCOUNT, NS.DESCRIPTION, I.IMAGE_ID, I.FILE_PATH FROM HANJU_NORMAL_SELL NS INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT P ON NS.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN HANJU_IMAGE I ON P.PRODUCT_ID = I.FK_ID AND I.FILE_STATUS = 'D'

SELECT GS.GROUP_SELL_ID, GS.PRODUCT_ID, P.PRODUCT_NAME, GS.DESCRIPTION, GS.TARGET_AMOUNT, GS.END_DATE, GS.DISCOUNT, I.IMAGE_ID, I.FILE_PATH FROM HANJU_GROUP_SELL GS INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT P ON GS.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN HANJU_IMAGE I ON GS.PRODUCT_ID = I.FK_ID AND I.FILE_STATUS = 'D'
mapper.update: UPDATE HANJU_GROUP_SELL SET DESCRIPTION = #{description}, TARGET_AMOUNT = #{targetAmount}, END_DATE = #{endDate}, DISCOUNT = #{discount} WHERE GROUP_SELL_ID = #{groupSellId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HANJU_NORMAL_SELL NS INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT P ON NS.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID WHERE P.SELLER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HANJU_GROUP_SELL GS INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT P ON GS.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID WHERE P.SELLER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HANJU_BILL B INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT P ON B.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID WHERE P.SELLER_ID = #{userId} AND B.KIND = 'N' AND B.STATUS = 'B'

SELECT B.BILL_ID, P.PRODUCT_NAME, B.PRODUCT_COUNT, B.CDATETIME, U.USER_NAME, U.PHONE, U.ZIPNO || ' ' || U.ROADADDRPART1 || ' ' || U.ADDRDETAIL AS ADDRESS, I.FILE_PATH FROM HANJU_BILL B INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT P ON B.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_IMAGE I ON B.PRODUCT_ID = I.FK_ID AND I.FILE_STATUS = 'T' INNER JOIN HANJU_USER U ON B.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND B.STATUS = 'B' WHERE P.SELLER_ID = #{userId} AND B.KIND = 'N' ORDER BY B.CDATETIME ASC
